title: Chilli beef ramen
ingredients: ['350g rump steak, trimmed and sliced into thin strips', '2 tablespoons sesame oil', 'salt and pepper to taste', '2 small red onions, cut into thin rings', '2 cloves garlic, finely sliced', '1L hot water', '2 Knorr® chicken stockpots', '3 tablespoons dark soy sauce', '1 carrot, sliced into fine strips', '1/2 leek, sliced into fine strips', '1 packet straight to wok noodles (I use Sharwoods® Udon)', '1/2 a lime, juice only', '1/4 Chinese leaf, finely shredded', '4 spring onions, finely chopped', '1 to 2 large red chillies, deseeded and finely sliced', '2 tablespoons sesame seeds']
